tool_description: [IMPROVED SEARCH API]  API Redfin offers a powerful search feature that allows users to easily find their desired properties. With the search tool, users can refine their search based on location, price range, property type, and various other criteria. They can also customize their search by specifying the number of bedrooms and bathrooms, square footage, and other specific features they are looking for in a home. Redfin's search feature provides accurate and up-to-date results, helping users...
name: Redfin Base
title: Redfin Base

api_list.name: Search by region

required_parameters.name: region_type
required_parameters.description:
One of the following :       
` -1`: Unknowns |   `1`: Neighborhood
`2`: Zip Code  |   `4`: State
`5`: County |   `6`: City
`7`: School|   `8`: School District
`9`: Service Region|  `10`: Minor Civil Division
`11`: Country|  `30`: CA Postal Code
`31`: CA Province|  `32`:  CA Provincial Division
`33`: CA Municipality|   `34`: CA Forward Sortation Area
Or Use API 【**Get region info**】to get   `region_type_id`

required_parameters.name: region_id
required_parameters.description: Use the【Get region info】API to get the `region_id  ` value.

optional_parameters.name: min_stories
optional_parameters.description: Enter a value in the range 1 ～ 20

optional_parameters.name: home_type
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the parameters below:
For `search_type `＝ **ForSale** OR **Sold**
  ● House
  ● Townhouse
  ● Condo
  ● Land
  ● MultiFamily
  ● Mobile
  ● Coop
  ● Other
For `search_type `＝ **ForRent**
  ● Apartment
※ Separated by a comma for multiple options
EX: House, Townhouse

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description:
For search_type ＝**ForSale**

Enter the parameters below: 
● active
● comingsoon
● undercontract_pending
※ Separated by a comma for multiple options
EX: active, comingsoon

optional_parameters.name: max_stories
optional_parameters.description: Enter a value in the range 1 ～ 20

optional_parameters.name: max_num_beds
optional_parameters.description: Enter a value in the range 1 ～ 5

optional_parameters.name: include_outdoor_parking
optional_parameters.description: 【Include outdoor parking】 value is reflected when at 【Garage spots】 is selected

optional_parameters.name: basement_types
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the parameters below:
  ● Finished
  ● Unfinished
※ Separated by a comma for multiple options
EX: Finished, Unfinished

optional_parameters.name: min_num_beds
optional_parameters.description: Enter a value in the range 1 ～ 5

api_list.name: Search

optional_parameters.name: sub_location
optional_parameters.description:
※ When searching by city, address, school, etc., you should enter the sub_location for more precise display (Using the API 【locationAutocompletev2】).

For Example: search by city
⊳ location: Brownsville
⊳ sub_location: Brownsville, TX, USA

api_list.name: Search by URL
Get ZipCode by City
Get location infomation by zipcode
Property details

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description:
input: url, address
Ex: 
url: https://www.redfin.com/TX/Brownsville/5065-Eloy-St-78521/home/123165030
 ● `5065-Eloy-St-78521` : address
 ● `123165030` : propertyId

optional_parameters.name: propertyId
optional_parameters.description: ※ When entering an address and the returned results contain multiple identical addresses, please select the propertyId to display more accurate results.

api_list.name: Auto-complete-v2
api_list.description:
You send a request and receive the following information:
- `id`: The unique identifier for the city.
- `type`: The type of the city.
- `name`: The name of the city.
- `subName`: The additional description of the city.
- `url`: The direct URL to access the city's information page on Redfin.com.
- `active`: The active status of the city.
- `claimedHome`: The status of claimed home ownership.
- `invalidMRS`: The invalid MRS (Market Revenue Share) status.
- `businessMarketIds`: The list of relevant business market IDs.
- `countryCode`: The country code.
- `internalSearchVolume`: The internal search volume statistic.

api_list.name: Get region info
api_list.description:
This API will return `region_type_id`, `region_id`
➞ Will use for API 【Search by region】

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
The input value can be full URL or sub URL
- **Full URL**: `https://www.redfin.com/zipcode/01026`
- **Sub URL**: `/zipcode/01026` (use the Auto-complete API to get the value, it is a property URL)

api_list.name: Auto-complete
api_list.description:
You send a request and receive the following information:
- `id`: The unique identifier for the city.
- `type`: The type of the city.
- `name`: The name of the city.
- `subName`: The additional description of the city.
- `url`: The direct URL to access the city's information page on Redfin.com.
- `active`: The active status of the city.
- `claimedHome`: The status of claimed home ownership.
- `invalidMRS`: The invalid MRS (Market Revenue Share) status.
- `businessMarketIds`: The list of relevant business market IDs.
- `countryCode`: The country code.
- `internalSearchVolume`: The internal search volume statistic.

api_list.name: Get zipcode by county
